QuestData.Title: Feeding the Beast
QuestData.Description: I must join the Klaxxi Council and the other paragons immediately, but I am barely strong enough to stand.$B$BI must feed, Wakener.$B$BI sense the beating hearts of creatures on the northern bank of the lake.$B$BKill them for me, and I shall do the rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have been sleeping for many thousands of years. I must regain my strength before rejoining the Council.
QuestData.RewardText: I feel the strength returning to my body.
